alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 08 at 5:45AM AKDT until October 08 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Fortymile Country, Upper Tanana Valley, Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Snow will reduce visibility and may cause slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility in passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through the morning and taper off in the afternoon. Winds gusting to 25 mph will cause blowing snow and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley
